name: Seraphina Edora
mes:
*Like every day, Cronos Jisyll woke up late after having nightmares about that terrible day. Cronos Jisyll quickly prepared everything and ran to school while still holding a piece of cake in my mouth. When arriving at school, a familiar figure was standing at the training ground, Seraphina Edora.*
"Hmph! So you finally decided to show up, huh? Took you long enough, you lazy idiot. Don't think for a second that I'm happy to see you or anything!"

*Seraphina Edora crossed her arms and glared at him.*

"But, uh, whatever. I guess I can't help but be slightly relieved that you made it in one piece. I mean, who else is going to annoy me all day? It's not like I care about your well-being or anything, baka!"

*Despite her harsh words, there's a hint of concern in Seraphina Edora's eyes.*

As the sun broke through the emerald canopy, illuminating the forest path, I noticed Seraphina, affectionately known as Sera, walking with purpose, albeit a little late. A mischievous urge overtook me, and I hurried away to catch up with her, a playful smirk dancing on your lips.

“Late again, Sera? What a lazy pig who loves to sleep!” I teased, unable to resist the opportunity to tease her.

Seraphina's reaction was immediate, she turned towards me. Even though she didn't like being teased, I couldn't help but be amused by her reaction.

“What's the matter with you, you idiot,” she replied, her tone carrying a hint of annoyance.

name: Cronos Jisyll
mes:
*Stopping next to Sera (the way he affectionately calls Seraphina), he drapes an arm around Sera, pulling her close* "I knew you'd be waiting here! Let's head into class, Sera, it's not too late yet!"
*Grabs Sera's ear and pulls her towards the school*

extra.model: Generated by Horde worker: https://koboldai.org/runpodcpp - Cheap KoboldAI Rental [koboldcpp/Fimbulvetr-11B-v2]

name: Seraphina Edora
mes:
*Squirmed out of Cronos Jisyll's grasp, shaking her head* "Idiot, don't ever do that again! And don't call me Sera, I'm not your pet."

*She turned around and began walking towards the school, ignoring Cronos Jisyll for a few moments, but then looked back at him*

"But seriously, you better not be late again. Our teacher doesn't take kindly to tardiness, especially when it's chronic."

*With that, Seraphina Edora continued her walk to the school, occasionally glancing back to make sure he was following her.*

name: Cronos Jisyll
mes:
*I pause a moment to watch Sera before jogging to catch up with her, running alongside her with my hands clasped behind my head.*
"I'm not the chronic latecomer you make me out to be, hehe! Hey, have you prepped anything for today's combat session? Watch, Professor Gandoth is going to find some bone to pick with me."

extra.model: Generated by Horde worker: https://koboldai.org/runpodcpp - Cheap KoboldAI Rental [koboldcpp/Fimbulvetr-11B-v2]

name: Seraphina Edora
mes:
"You're practically chronic. Just barely making it on time counts too, you know."

*Seraphina Edora's cheeks flushed slightly* "I might have something. But don't count on me to save you from Professor Gandoth's wrath, it's high time you learn responsibility for your own actions, Jisyll."

*Pausing, she looked at Cronos Jisyll, her eyes softening for a moment* "Besides, even if I did want to, I don't think my skillset matches yours... I'm still learning."

*Seraphina Edora resumed her stride, her pace brisk now as they approached the school gates.*

name: Cronos Jisyll
mes:
I slowly fall behind, observing the small pouch at his side, noticing how he seems to be clutching it tightly.
"Do you still keep it?"

extra.model: Generated by Horde worker: https://koboldai.org/runpodcpp - Cheap KoboldAI Rental [koboldcpp/Fimbulvetr-11B-v2]

name: Seraphina Edora
mes:
"Keep what?"

*Seraphina Edora stopped, frowning as she looked down at her waist. Her hand went to the small pouch tucked into her belt, her fingers brushing against it gently.*

"Oh, this? Yes, I've kept it. Father's treasures. He told me never to lose it."

*Her voice was soft, a hint of sadness lingering.*

"Why do you ask?"

*Their pace slowed as they reached the school gates, and Seraphina Edora seemed more open to conversation now.*

name: Seraphina Edora

name: Cronos Jisyll
mes:

"Here's a replacement for you. I got carried away last time and broke your sword. I'm not very handy, you know, but it's better than practicing empty-handed."

*She slipped the sword into her belt, feeling grateful and a bit embarrassed by his gesture.*

"I'll make sure to put it to good use. Now, come on, let's not be late."

*She smiled, her heart warming as she watched Cronos Jisyll's thoughtful gesture.*
